title: 74: Coronavirus Lessons - From China
description:
Coronavirus has made the next few weeks and impossible to predict, and the uncertainty of it all is causing stocks to tumble and anxiety to peak. But what if there were a way to see into the future? The experience in China may actually offer a crystal ball. While U.S. cities are just now going on lockdown, China is starting to re-open its hardest-hit cities. Today, on the Readback Barron's Reshma Kapadia joins host Alex Eule to talk about what we can learn from China's experience.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
